thread.title: Kanye West for Super Bowl 52 campaign underway as Kim Kardashian backs husband for halftime show
thread.title_full: Kanye West for Super Bowl 52 campaign underway as Kim Kardashian backs husband for halftime show

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Kanye West for Super Bowl 52 campaign underway as Kim Kardashian backs husband for halftime show
text:
Kanye West for Super Bowl 52 campaign underway as Kim Kardashian backs husband for halftime show Fans are already calling for the rapper to follow on from Lady Gaga's stunning performance Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
Kanye West fans are already campaigning for him to perform at Super Bowl 52 in 2018 - and Kim Kardashian approves of the idea. 
The world is still buzzing about Lady Gaga's stunning halftime show on Sunday night but some people are turning their attention to next year's big game, and speculation about who will land the prestigious gig. 
Many have taken to social media to launch the "KanyeforSuperbowl52 hashtag, with many tweeting the slogan of sorts alongside pictures of the star's live show. Could Kanye West appear at the Super Bowl next year? (Photo: NBCUniversal) 
One fan page wrote: "Never too early. #KanyeForSuperbowl52 (sic)" 
The tweets caught the attention of Kanye's wife Kim, who retweeted them in apparent support of the idea. His wife Kim clearly thinks it should happen (Photo: Twitter/Kanyewest) 
Not everyone is sold though, with many Twitter users using the hashtag to voice their disapproval. 
"No #KanyeForSuperbowl52 #NeverKanye I want @taylorswift13 to perform instead #Swifities #TaylorForSuperbowl52 (sic)," tweeted one critic. Lady Gag impressed the world on Sunday night (Photo: Getty Images) Can anyone follow THAT performance? (Photo: Getty Images) 
He shared a picture on Instagram of the pair partying after the huge show, and wrote: "The most spectacular performance ever seen during Super Bowl half time. 
"Such a thrill to be there. @ladygaga @davidfurnish (sic)" Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
